entry.title: AngularJs Learning Note-1
entry.content:
這是 code school AngularJs 的一些個人筆記, 希望我可以好好學習！

Prepare env

  • Download AngularJs
    • need angular.min.js
  • Download Twitter Bootstrap
    • need Bootstrap.min.css

Modules

  • write pieces of angular application.
  • define dependencies for our app.

``` html

ng-app –> attach the Application Module to the page, run this module when the document loads

ng-controller –> attach a controller function to the page

```

Expressions

``` html

I am 10

I am {{4 + 6}}

Hello you

{{“Hello” + “you”}} ```

More Operations

Sample app code

``` javascript // app.js (function(){ var app = angular.module(‘store’, []); app.controller(‘StoreController’, function(){

  this.product = gem;

});

// Sample javascript obj var gem = {

  name: "Dodecahedron',
  price: 2.95,
  description: '.....',

}

})();

```

``` html 

  <h1> {{store.product.name}} </h1>
  <h2> ${{store.product.price}} </h2>
  ...

{{store.product.name}} <– won’t work !! ```
